00055 class LruCacheKey {
00056     template<class TYPE> friend class LruCache;
00057 
00058   public:
00059     LruCacheKey() {}
00060 
00061     LruCacheKey(const LruCacheKey& src) : mKey(src.mKey) {}
00062 
00063     LruCacheKey& operator=(const LruCacheKey& rhs) {
00064         mKey = rhs.mKey;
00065         return *this;
00066     }
00067 
00068     ~LruCacheKey() {}
00069 
00070   private:
00071     LruCacheKey(const LruCacheKeyImpl& key) {
00072         mKey = key;
00073     }
00074 
00075     LruCacheKeyImpl mKey;
00076 };
00077 
00078 template<class TYPE>
00079 class LruCache : private LruCacheImpl {
00080     static const size_t INIT_CACHE_SIZE = 20;
00081 
00082   public:
00086     LruCache();
00087 
00091     explicit LruCache(size_t size);
00092 
00096     virtual ~LruCache();
00097 
00102     virtual void deleter(TYPE* item) = 0;
00103 
00107     void resize(size_t maxSize);
00108 
00112     TYPE* get(const LruCacheKey& key);
00113 
00118     LruCacheKey put(TYPE* item);
00119 
00124     TYPE* unCache(const LruCacheKey& key);
00125 
00130     void remove(const LruCacheKey& key);
00131 
00135     void evictAll();
00136 
00140     size_t size();
00141

00146

00181 template<class TYPE>
00182 LruCache<TYPE>::LruCache() : LruCacheImpl(INIT_CACHE_SIZE) {
00183 }
00184 
00185 template<class TYPE>
00186 LruCache<TYPE>::LruCache(size_t size) : LruCacheImpl(size) {
00187 }
00188 
00189 template<class TYPE>
00190 LruCache<TYPE>::~LruCache() {
00191     if (LruCacheImpl::size() != 0) {
00192         GLOG(LOG_TAG, LOGER,
00193             "Must call evictAll() before release derived LruCache! "
00194             "Might cause memory leak here!");
00195         LruCacheImpl::evictAll(true);
00196     }
00197 }
00198 
00199 template<class TYPE>
00200 void LruCache<TYPE>::resize(size_t maxSize) {
00201     LruCacheImpl::resize(maxSize);
00202 }
00203 
00204 template<class TYPE>
00205 TYPE* LruCache<TYPE>::get(const LruCacheKey& key) {
00206     return static_cast<TYPE*>(LruCacheImpl::get(key.mKey));
00207 }
00208 
00209 template<class TYPE>
00210 LruCacheKey LruCache<TYPE>::put(TYPE* item) {
00211     return LruCacheKey(LruCacheImpl::put(item));
00212 }
00213 
00214 template<class TYPE>
00215 TYPE* LruCache<TYPE>::unCache(const LruCacheKey& key) {
00216     return static_cast<TYPE*>(LruCacheImpl::removeFromCache(key.mKey));
00217 }
00218 
00219 template<class TYPE>
00220 void LruCache<TYPE>::remove(const LruCacheKey& key) {
00221     deleter(static_cast<TYPE*>(LruCacheImpl::removeFromCache(key.mKey)));
00222 }
00223 
00224 template<class TYPE>
00225 void LruCache<TYPE>::evictAll() {
00226     LruCacheImpl::evictAll(false);
00227 }
00228

00259 template<class TYPE>
00260 void LruCache<TYPE>::deleterWrapper(void* item) {
00261     deleter(static_cast<TYPE*>(item));
00262 }
00263 
00264 template<class TYPE>
00265 void LruCache<TYPE>::defaultDeletor(void* item) {
00266     delete static_cast<TYPE*>(item);
00267 }
